parameters.content: # Generate content based on the news for Medium, Linkedin & Instagram

# This automation is made by Codint

How to use this workflow?
1. Update the RSS feed node, to a relevant news source 
2. Change the prompt in the Best article finder to tailor for you company. Do this by using AI for an even better result.
3. Use an AI to change the system-prompts in the content generators. Make sure to include a tone of voice here!
4. Update where the emails are being send.


Potential improvements and why it isn't included:
- You could add a loop after sending the mail, so that the user can accept, change or cancel the post. We have decided to not do this to save cost, since you can create a similar gpt and update it in there for free.
- Automatically post the contents,  AI can make mistakes a human in the loop is always valuable
- More and other platforms to post on

# üì∞ Related News to Content Marketing

This workflow collects news from an RSS feed, finds the best article, and generates shareable content for Medium, LinkedIn, and Instagram using OpenAI. Drafts are sent to your email for review before posting.

## Quick Setup
	1.	RSS Feed ‚Üí Update the RSS Read node with your preferred news source(s).
	2.	OpenAI ‚Üí Add your API key in the Chat Model node and adjust prompts if needed.
	3.	Email ‚Üí Connect Gmail (or another service) in the Send Content Confirmation nodes and change mail to your personal mail
	4.	Run ‚Üí Test manually, then enable the Schedule Trigger for automation.

## ‚úÖ Perfect for marketers, social media managers, and creators who want consistent, AI-powered content.
